text: Who here lives in Germany and is willing to chat with me? I want to get a feeling for how it would be to live in Germany for a bit. My wife has a German passport and speaks German as her first language (but has never lived there, only been for holiday). I specifically want to find out how tight our budget would be on my current salary (as a worst case single-income scenario) and all the other little things, like is it fun to live there, where should we aim for, how easy will we make friends, what is life like generally etc.

My wife has a German passport and speaks German as her first language (but has never lived there, only been for holiday). I specifically want to find out how tight our budget would be on my current salary (as a worst case single-income scenario) and all the other little things, like is it fun to live there, where should we aim for, how easy will we make friends, what is life like generally etc.

text: Happy to speak with you, but it would have to be tomorrow.

elements.text: Happy to speak with you, but it would have to be tomorrow.

text: To answer your questions it would be helpful to know where you'd want to live

elements.text: To answer your questions it would be helpful to know where you'd want to live

text: Where do you live currently? Have you travelled abroad much?

elements.text: Where do you live currently? Have you travelled abroad much?

text: Thanks, that is part of what I'm trying to figure out

elements.text: Thanks, that is part of what I'm trying to figure out

text: I live in South Africa. I have travelled to Korea, Turkey, and all the neighbouring African countries. But I've never lived somewhere other than in South Africa
